attributes.action: Commence British Summer Time in mid February.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Summer Time ends approximately 8 weeks before the shortest day, however it restarts again 14 weeks after the shortest day meaning that we have to endure 6 more weeks of evening darkness than is necessary.  There is no reason for this disparity. There is enough daylight for children to go to school in the morning by mid February.
